NAME: More information about the GPL violation
AUTHOR: sev

BODY.p: There are certain speculations about the case, some of them are really wild. Unfortunately, no one approached any of us and there are only a few real facts in those blog posts.
Thus, in attempt to stop these potentially misleading messages, I made a blog post on my personal blog. I hope that I provided enough information there, if not, ask me for more details.
